Events and selected presentations

Events organised

  • Mini-symposium "Recent Advances in Distributed Optimization"
      International Conference on Continuous Optimization (ICCOPT), Lehigh University in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania, USA, 23 - 24 July, 2022.
      Co-organised with: Mingrui Liu.
  • Mini-symposium "Sparsity, Optimization and Learning"
      Curves and Surfaces, Arcachon France, 20 - 24 June, 2022.
      Co-organised with: Clarice Poon.
  • Mini-symposium "Geometric Aspects of Inverse Problems: Non-smooth Regularization and Optimization"
      Applied Inverse Problems, Grenoble France, 8 - 12 July, 2019.
      Co-organised with: Clarice Poon.
  • Mini-symposium "Approaches for Fast Optimisation in Imaging and Inverse Problems"
      SIAM Conference on Imaging Science, Bologna Italy, 5 - 8 June, 2018.
      Co-organised with: Mila Nikolova and Carola Schönlieb.

Selected presentations

  • Adaptive Acceleration for First-order Methods
      SIAM Conference on Optimization, Virtual, 20 - 23 July, 2021.
  • Trajectory of First-order Methods and Adaptive Acceleration
      Workshop on Efficient Algorithms in Data Science, Learning, and Computational Physics, Tsinghua Sanya International Mathematics Forum (TSIMF), Sanya China, 12 - 16 January, 2020.
  • A Fused Alternating relaxed Projection for Feasibility Problem
      The 64th Annual Meeting of the Australian Mathematical Society, University of New England, Australia, 8 - 10 December, 2020.
  • Geometry based Acceleration for Non-smooth Optimisation
      International Conference on Continuous Optimization (ICCOPT), Berlin Germany, 5 - 8 August, 2019.
  • Improving FISTA: Faster, Smarter and Greedier
      International Congress on Industrial and Applied Mathematics (ICIAM), Valencia Spain, 15 - 19 July, 2019.
  • Local Linear Convergence of Variance Reducing Stochastic Gradient Descent
      Applied Inverse Problems (AIP), Grenoble France, 8 - 12 July, 2019.
  • Make FISTA Faster Again
      SIAM Conference on Imaging Science, Bologna Italy, 5 - 8 June, 2018.
  • Activity Identification and Local Linear Convergence of Forward–Backward-type Methods
      Optimization, Lisbon Portugal, 6 - 8 September, 2017.
  • MUSTARD: a MUlti-Step inerTial operAtoR splitting methoD
      Workshop on Signal Processing, Optimization and Compressed Sensing (SPOC), Nankai University, Tianjin China, 17 - 21 December, 2016.
